scripts.kill:docker: docker stop centreon-dev && docker rm centreon-dev
scripts.cypress:local: pnpm start:docker && npx cypress run --config-file cypress.dev.json --browser=chrome && pnpm kill:docker
scripts.cypress:local:debug: pnpm start:docker && DEBUG=cypress:* npx cypress run --config-file cypress.dev.json --browser=chrome 2> ./cypress/results/logs.txt && pnpm kill:docker
scripts.cypress:local:ui: pnpm start:docker && npx cypress open --config-file cypress.dev.json --browser=chrome && pnpm kill:docker
